fulltext:
Vinh Nguyen
Last Updated on 20th November 2018
Summary
| am very active person, my main passion is computing, music in term of playing guitar, pho-
tography. I am very interesting in life, listening, learning and observing. I consider myself very
enthusiastic, always seeking perfect things in my projects and taking care of little detail. I al-
ways do my works with my passion and high responsibility. I truly belief in team work, respect
to others and transformational leadership, consider them my foundations and values. My
goal is to turn my passion for computer and life style by working as Mobile software Engineer,
Team Manager and Consultant. I have experienced as iOS Developer from 2011 working for
many projects in companies, I have worked with many friendly colleagues with much more
experiences come from many countries. From the start-ups to international organizations,
from ad-hoc web-based solutions to the latest development in mobile. As part of my life |
keep training, keep my skils up-to-date and with an eye in what's next to come.
